'''Radish Veggie Soup''' is a [[food]] item that the player can cook. The [[recipe]] for Radish Veggie Soup is available from the start of the game.

Depending on the quality, Radish Veggie Soup restores '''8'''/'''9'''/'''10'''% of Max HP to the selected character and regenerates '''210'''/'''260'''/'''300''' HP every 5 seconds for 30 seconds. Like most foods, this has no effect for other players in [[Co-Op Mode]].
